PROJECTS-DESCRIPTION: I did some unusual projects, like a game in Unity, a restaurant system with a online menu using Vue and Flutter, but I'm focused on React/Next, React-Native and Node Js.
JOBS-DESCRIPTION: At Blanko, I worked as a Full Stack developer, building from scratch a platform for selling pre-fabricated advertisements using famous people images. At Evoy, I worked on an IoT device platform, managing more than 10 thousand devices and their assets, I had multiple responsibilities, from maintaining the infrastructure in Aws, to building new features in React and Node.

ABOUT-SECTION.TITLE:
Hello! I`m Ed Angelis R Ribeiro Brazilian, 12/23/1984 
Welcome to my portfolio

DESCRIPTION.P1: I have always been passionate about technology. My journey into development began in August 2017, when I started my Bachelor’s Degree in Information Systems. Since then, I’ve been programming and learning almost every day — and with a smile, I can say this is something I’ll keep doing for the rest of my life.
DESCRIPTION.P2: When I’m not coding, studying, or exercising, I enjoy a wide range of activities: scuba diving, playing poker, and tennis. I also appreciate the simple things, — listening to music, watching movies, playing games, or reading something.
DESCRIPTION.P3: Looking ahead, I see myself in ten years working on projects with a global impact, reaching millions of users. I hope to still be coding daily, but also leading and inspiring a development team. Beyond my career, I picture myself tending to a garden, caring for cats, and watching my children grow up.

TEXT.7: Responding to change over following a plan
